quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them. – W. Clement Stone
fact: If one places a tiny amount of liquor on a scorpion, it will instantly go mad and sting itself to death.
joke: A doll was recently found dead in a rice paddy. It's the only known instance of a nick nack paddy wack.
